findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized user to upgrade its scripts.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: The smart contract has an active ownership which creates a risk of rug pull scams and centralization hacks.

findings.title: Addition Overflow
findings.description: The 'add' function in SafeMath library does not check for addition overflow which can cause unexpected behavior.
